instruction: Please provide an explanation for the widening yield spread in the Chinese bond market in 2021 based on the information provided in the graph.
output: According to the graph, the widening yield spread in the Chinese bond market in 2021 was mainly driven by the corporate bond sector. In fact, the yield spread of the ChinaBond Credit Bond Index widened by 18 basis points, while the yield spread of the ChinaBond Financial Bond Index narrowed by 8 basis points. The primary reason for the widening yield spread of the ChinaBond Credit Bond Index was the increase in credit spread in the real estate industry of about 1,500 basis points.
